name: Slacker's Struggle - Can You Survive?
description:
You're a senior in your university, and your time is almost up, finish your thesis or dropping out is the next thing you'll get. However, there are a lot of things that distracts you from finishing your own thesis. Can you manage to avoid these temptations and graduate with flying colours?

===============================================================

Controls:

Space button: Game Start

Up directional button (↑) : Jump

Down directional button (↓) : Slide
